cab.content: (This Document jis; the Property of His Britannic "Ma,iesty^s Gdvernme")"-SEC RET 0.P.-348 (24)CABINET. LBAKAG3 OP INFORMATION. Note by the Secretary. The Prime Minister proposes to raise at the cabinet meeting on Wednesday next, the 18th Instant, an article onpage' 9 of the "Daily Mail" of June 13th, 1924, headed"Cabinet and the Beds", where certain information is givenwhich would appear to have been obtainable only by access to Cabinet proceedings. (Signed) M.P.A. HAWKEY.Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1, June 16, 1924. fa(This Document the groperty of His Britannic Majesty's Government.')-SEC RET -C_._P.-548 (24). CABINET. LEAKAGE OF INFORMATION. Note by the Secretary. The Prime Minister proposes to raise at the Cabinet Meeting on Wednesday next, the 18th Instant, an article on page' 9 of the "Daily Mail" of June 13th, 1924, headed "Cabinet and the Reds", where certain information is given which would appear to have been obtainable only by access to Cabinet proceedings. (Signed) M.P.A. HANKEY.tWhitehall Gardens, S.W.1, June 1.6, 1924.
